titleStmt.title: A letter from a person of quality to his friend in the country
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.
Locke, John, 1632-1704.

notesStmt.note: Written by Shaftesbury. Also ascribed to John Locke. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
